strings.string: Gather 3 lost hunters, face hunger, walk forward with tenacity.

In this map, you will not accumulate knowledge points to trade for new technologies. Nemesis asks you to hunt to learn how to make better weapons, manufacture and use simple tools to learn how to make better tools, build simple structures to learn how to build new structures, and accumulate materials to discover new uses.

Eight months ago, the elder commanded us to establish a temporary fishing camp here. We should go back in the summer. Zchwifty, Nahkia and Bhuds went hunting and didn't return. A fire burned our supplies. Le'vel wants to go back to the village but Zlob'naya says we can't cross the mountains during winter. What should we do?
Zchwifty is a friend of the tribe that lives here. For now, they will not attack us ... but if he dies, we are doomed.
Bhuds can follow any animal trail.
Nahkia knows many things about this land.
Zchwifty is dead ... and with him the truce died. The tribe that lives in these lands is coming for us. We are doomed.
Bhuds said he saw tracks of two young mammoths near the village. It's a waste of time arguing with him.

People commented that Nakia forgot a pot of grain in the rain. Today she decided to boil the mixture. Maybe she wants to dry the rotten grains. It is a waste of food and logs. Congratulations! You discovered the Brewing technology.
"Kill this wolf now or it will come for revenge." (You have discovered Dogs Domestication technology.)
"Who keeps today, eat tomorrow." (You have discovered Food Drying technology.)
"The strength and ferocity of the great beasts is in their bones." (You have discovered Spirituality technology.)
"The good side of summer is the fruit, the bad are the insects." (You have discovered Tanning technology.)
"Bone against flesh! Now the great beasts are doomed!" (You have discovered Bone Tools technology.)
"A biface at the tip of a spear ... Why didn't I think of that before?" (You have discovered Composite Tools technology.)
"... and the bear said: Am I Goliath, that you come at me with a sling?" (You have discovered Slingmaking technology.)
"Clay and fire ... is that all I need?" (Congratulations! You discovered Pottery technology and Mankind entered the Mesolithic Era.)
"A stone can be everything if you know how to get everything out of it." (You have discovered Stone Polishing technology.)
"I am tired of carrying stones and logs." (You have discovered Sledgemaking technology.)
"We need to hunt these mice or there will be no grain left for the winter." (You have discovered Grain Processing technology.)
"It tastes bad, but it's food." (You have discovered Pulse Processing technology.)
"If it were small, it would serve to hunt mice." (You have discovered Archery technology.)
"Teach a dog to protect the granary or get another animal to do so." (Congratulations! You discovered Cereal Domestication technology and Mankind entered the Neolithic Era.)
"Plant in winter? Who had this bad idea?" (You have discovered Pulse Domestication technology.)
"Plant clothes? Doesn't look too smart to me!" (You have discovered Flax Domestication technology.)
"With some furniture, this mine could be a cave." (You have discovered Underground Mining technology.)
"Without cats, a granary only facilitates the work of mice." (You have discovered Thatching technology.)
"Too much work for water. If only it were beer ..." (You have discovered Well Digging technology.)
"Gates, towers, platforms ... where will I get logs for all this?" (You have discovered Fortifications technology.)
"Lots of milk and no cats. This is wrong." (You have discovered Goat Domestication technology.)
"It's hot and beautiful, but itchy." (You have discovered Sheep Domestication technology.)
"Is there much left to invent sausages?" (You have discovered Pig Domestication technology.)
"New clothes ... I'm starting to enjoy civilized life." (You have discovered Weaving technology.)
"Bath in ice water? Nevermore!" (You have discovered Stilting technology.)
"Why carry stones if we can make cave paintings?" (You have discovered Megalithism technology.)
Hunt 5 cave lions, 5 wolves, 5 cave bears
Store 15 skins outfits, 25 raw skins, hunt 10 cave bears, 10 wolves, 10 cave lions
Store 30 bone, 10 wooden spears, 10 wooden harpoons, hunt 5 mammoths, 5 rhinos
Store 20 flint, 10 bone spears, 10 bone harpoons, 20 biface, hunt 15 mammoths, 15 rhinos
Store 20 raw meat, 15 raw fish, 50 sticks, build 5 skin dryers
Hunt 10 mammoths, 10 rhinos, store 30 bones, build 5 skull poles, 5 tents
Collect 20 nuts, store 20 skin outfits, 30 raw skins, 60 sticks
Store 10 flint spear, 10 flint axes, 10 bone harpoons, 20 slings, 20 biface, 20 leather outfit, build 5 totem, 5 food dryer
Store 15 stone, 10 flint axe, 10 flint spear, 10 flint pick, 75 cured meat
Collect 60 berries, store 15 berries, 10 flint sicle
Collect 10 grain, 20 flour, 30 bread, store 15 flint sickle, build 1 mortar, 1 haystack
Kill 10 raiders, store 25 sling, 25 flint spear
Collect 40 grain, 40 flour, 50 bread, store 10 grain, 25 flint sickle, build 3 mortar, 3 haystack
Collect 50 flint, store 20 logs, 15 flint pick
Build 15 totem, collect 50 stone, store 20 flint pick
